headline: How The Narrative Around American Water Works Company (AWK) Is Shifting With The Essential Utilities Merger
summary: Analysts have made a minor adjustment to their view on American Water Works Company, trimming the fair value estimate to US$143.00 from US$143.78 as they factor in a more balanced mix of optimism and caution around the proposed Essential Utilities merger. This reflects how recent research is weighing the potential upside of the deal against its long approval path and the preference some firms have for other utilities that are more directly tied to power demand themes. Stay tuned to see how...
